thread.title: Mike Portnoy Announces 'First Full Return To Prog Metal' With Mysterious New Supergroup [News]
thread.title_full: Mike Portnoy Announces 'First Full Return To Prog Metal' With Mysterious New Supergroup [News]

title: Mike Portnoy Announces 'First Full Return To Prog Metal' With Mysterious New Supergroup [News]
text:
Mike Portnoy Announces 'First Full Return to Prog Metal' With Mysterious New Supergroup The man's in LA tracking some drums... Posted 18 hours ago 4 
Mike Portnoy revealed he's involved with a new supergroup, branding the endeavor his first full-on prog-metal project since the Dream Theater days.The drummer noted: "I'm in LA recording an album with something NEW... Sorry, this is all you're gonna get outta me on this for a while... More will be revealed at a later date... stay tuned! #ProgMetalSupergroup Coming soon..." 
In the comments section, a dude said: "Judging by the kit, you're actually playing drums again and expressing yourself to your magnificent fullest, not just dropping beats. I am intrigued. I miss you, Mike. We all miss you. Remember the creative titan that brought us the playing in DT, OSI, Liquid Tension? I want that shit back, man. I just want Mike back," to which Mike replied: 
"That was the worst back handed compliment I've ever heard... FYI - I have been TOTALLY been 'expressing myself to the fullest' the last 6 years There's more to music than a million notes... That said, this new thing is indeed my first full return to 'Prog Metal'"
